originContent: # Quick Draw
translatedContent: # Quick Draw

originContent: ![screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)
translatedContent: ![capture d’écran](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)

originContent: Do you need a quick, easy and unobtrusive way to highlight content while screencasting?
translatedContent: Avez-vous besoin d’un moyen rapide, simple et discret pour mettre en valeur du contenu lors de screencasts ?

originContent: Rather than circling your mouse around wildly, try QuickDraw!
translatedContent: Plutôt que de faire tourner votre souris de manière désordonnée, essayez QuickDraw !

originContent: When QuickDraw is active, you can draw lines, arrows, rectangle and circles over other windows on your screen. Press the escape key to clear the drawing, and press it again to jump right back to where you were without missing a beat!
translatedContent: Lorsque QuickDraw est actif, vous pouvez tracer des lignes, des flèches, des rectangles et des cercles par-dessus d’autres fenêtres à l’écran. Appuyez sur la touche Échap pour effacer le dessin, puis appuyez de nouveau dessus pour revenir immédiatement à votre point d’origine sans perdre le rythme !

originContent: ### Usage
translatedContent: ### Utilisation

originContent: Keyboard Shortcuts
translatedContent: Raccourcis clavier

originContent: Key/s       Function
translatedContent: Key/s       Function

originContent: 12345       Select colours 1 to 5
translatedContent: 12345       Select colours 1 to 5

originContent: L           Line mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight lines
translatedContent: L           Line mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight lines

originContent: A           Arrow mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight arrows
translatedContent: A           Arrow mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight arrows

originContent: R           Rectangle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
translatedContent: R           Rectangle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill

originContent: C           Circle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
translatedContent: C           Circle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill

originContent: ⌘C          Copy screenshot to Clipboard (permissions may be requested the first time)
translatedContent: ⌘C          Copy screenshot to Clipboard (permissions may be requested the first time)

originContent: ⌘S          Save a screenshot to Finder
translatedContent: ⌘S          Save a screenshot to Finder

originContent: ⌘Z          Undo
translatedContent: ⌘Z          Undo

originContent: Space       Hold whilst drawing to adjust object position
translatedContent: Space       Hold whilst drawing to adjust object position

originContent: ⌫           Backspace to delete all drawings below the mouse
translatedContent: ⌫           Backspace to delete all drawings below the mouse

originContent: /           Show or hide the startup message (persisted)
translatedContent: /           Show or hide the startup message (persisted)

originContent: ⌥/          Show or hide the toolbar (persisted)
translatedContent: ⌥/          Show or hide the toolbar (persisted)

originContent: ESC         Clear all drawings. Press again to hide Quick Draw
translatedContent: ESC         Clear all drawings. Press again to hide Quick Draw

originContent: ## Motivation
translatedContent: ## Motivation

originContent: 1. I  mentor an online Swift course and would like a quick, easy and unobtrusive way to highlight and describe code during video calls
translatedContent: 1. Je mentor un cours en ligne de Swift et je souhaite un moyen rapide, facile et discret de mettre en évidence et de décrire du code lors des appels vidéo

originContent: 2. I would like to increase my experience in macOS development (I am an iOS developer)
translatedContent: 2. Je voudrais augmenter mon expérience en développement macOS (je suis développeur iOS)

originContent: 3. I would like to experiment with creating a simple architecture that has no third party dependencies
translatedContent: 3. Je voudrais expérimenter la création d’une architecture simple sans dépendances tierces

originContent: ## Found a bug?
translatedContent: ## Bug trouvé ?

originContent: Feel free to create an issue, or fix it yourself - pull requests are welcome!
translatedContent: N’hésitez pas à créer un ticket, ou à le corriger vous-même - les pull requests sont les bienvenues !
